Title: Lupello
Description:
I've been thinking... the wolves might stop attacking if we kill their pack leader.

We call him Lupello, and he patrols the opposite riverbank.

<Francis' concentration is broken by another attack. Perhaps you should go deal with Lupello yourself.>
PortraitGiverText: Leader of wolves, devourer of lambs.
CompletionText: What will Master Shang say when he finds out?
RewardText: I know I should be the one fighting them off. Maybe I'm not cut out for shepherding after all.
